remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化 控件的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Button" 文本字符串。The "button" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件动态添加到 Web 窗体页。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically add an control to the Web Forms page. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，单击 控件时，将执行页验证。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 使用 属性单击 控件时，可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要防止执行验证，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常用于 事件的事件处理程序中，以防止在单击 "取消" 或 "重置" 按钮时进行页验证。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性阻止页验证发生。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意， 方法独立激活每个验证控件。Note that the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonCausesValidation/CS/htmlbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonCausesValidation/VB/htmlbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 引发 事件并为生成回发而注册客户端脚本。

span.span: Raises the event and registers client script for generating a postback.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的 方法，以使其始终显示带有粗体文本的 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always displays the with bold text. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlbutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlbutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlbutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlbutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使你可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件导致从客户端到服务器的往返过程中发生往返。This event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 它有意不同于客户端 `OnClick` 事件。It is deliberately different from the client-side `OnClick` event. 如果在代码运行与 事件之间存在冲突，并由客户端 `OnClick` 事件运行代码，则服务器端事件说明将覆盖客户端代码。If a conflict exists between code run with a event and code run by a client-side `OnClick` event, the server-side event instructions will override the client-side code. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式为 事件指定和编写事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 单击 控件时，将显示在文本框中输入的值。When the control is clicked, the value entered in the text box is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式指定和编写 事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/CS/htmlbuttonconstructorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/VB/htmlbuttonconstructorvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 当 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将使用 方法来引发 事件。The method is used by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event. 如果 `true` 属性，则使用 属性中指定的控件组调用 方法。If the property is `true`, the method is called using the group of controls specified in the property. 此方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性呈现到指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法写入呈现的 控件的 `onclick` 属性，然后调用基 方法。The method writes the `onclick` attribute of the rendered control, and then calls the base method. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的 方法，以便始终显示 控件的标题。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a title is always displayed for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributes.vb#2)]

summary.span: 当用户单击客户端网页上的某个 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks an control on the client Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此服务器事件会导致从客户端到服务器的往返过程。This server event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 它有意不同于客户端 `OnClick` 事件。It is deliberately different from the client-side `OnClick` event. 如果在代码运行与 事件之间存在冲突，并由客户端 `OnClick` 事件运行代码，则服务器端事件说明将覆盖客户端代码。If a conflict exists between code run with a event and code run by a client-side `OnClick` event, the server-side event instructions will override the client-side code. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式为 事件指定和编写事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 单击 控件时，将显示在文本框中输入的值。When the control is clicked, the value entered in the text box is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式指定和编写 事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/CS/htmlbuttonconstructorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/VB/htmlbuttonconstructorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("") indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性可指定 控件回发到服务器时所导致验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当 属性的值设置为 `true`时，此属性才有效。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为 属性指定值，则当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值，并且 属性设置为 `true`，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定 控件回发到服务器时要验证的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 此页包含两个文本框，用于捕获用户的数据和两个 控件，以确保用户不会将文本框留空。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 第一个文本框的 控件位于 `CityInfoGroup` 验证组中，第二个框的 控件位于 `StateInfoGroup` 验证组中。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 单击 `CityQueryButton` 后，只验证 `CityInfoGroup` 验证组中的控件。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 单击 `StateQueryButton` 后，只验证 `StateInfoGroup` 验证组中的控件。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonValidationGroup/CS/htmlbuttonvalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonValidationGroup/VB/htmlbuttonvalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Introduction to the Validation Controls
